TopicTitle: Remove one letter from a movie title and describe the new movie in a single line

Articles.Content:
Raiders of the Lost AK: In a dystopian future, a group of criminals steals the last AK-47 in the world.

I don't know how I come up with things like this.

Riders Of The Lost Ark: When the rodeo machine breaks down, the locals despair. Then an archaeologist comes to town and he has with him the solution.

 

Star Wars: Attack Of The Cones. The temperature rises when two Hollywood divas find they both wear the same dress at the same party. Only way to cool down is to distribute ice cream left and right.

Edited July 31, 2016 by LN400

STAR REK ..... a mission to Mars goes wrong and the ship is nearly destroyed.....

STAR ARS ... a group of Space pirates travel the Galaxy saying "Arrrrrrr"

GONE WITH THE WIN ..... The Kiwi Rugby Team win the World Cup again and then vanish....
Pollo 13, the story about how chicken finds it's way to the table after the oven suffers a failure in the preheat.
The Return Of The Pink Panter: When John came back to the gym, the trainers knew it was going to be a long day.

The Martin : A man named Martin is stuck on the Moon. (The Martian)

Edited August 1, 2016 by OrbitalBuzzsaw

Petty Woman: When Edward Lewis spots a woman in the street, he remembers he must call his attorney to discuss something more important.

Pretty Oman: A roadtrip across Oman.

Edited August 1, 2016 by LN400

Aws - a movie about people watching a 15%-rated movie

Edited August 2, 2016 by KSP Bros KS

Casio Royale: The Casio company's grand adventure to become top electronics manufacturer

The Sining: A sine function goes on a rampage to kill the other trigonometric functions

Tomorrow Never Dis: James Bond fights an evil Frenchman

Over the edge: The adventures of a daredevil
Tomorrowlad - The future Irish boy story.

Apollo 3 : Saturn IB Test Launches

 

Edited August 2, 2016 by OrbitalBuzzsaw
Rozen: movie about great british scientist who gonna discover Erendal.

The Dark Night:

Movie about a blackout that happens in New York and people freak out because they can't see anything.

 

Goofellas:

Couple of fellas made out of goo start a mob.

Edited August 2, 2016 by ToukieToucan

Mas Attacks: Attack of the worlds mas locos (craziest) people.

Edited August 2, 2016 by TopHeavy11

The Longest ay!

Fonzie prepares to storm the beach at Normandy and fires his gun continuously..... Ayyyyyyyy Ayyyyyyyyy Ayyyyyyyy.... a Gatling Ay gun!

(Happy Days tie in....)

around the word in 80 days.  Mr fogg gonna discover one word i 80 days

Edited August 3, 2016 by TedwinKnockman66
Mater of the World:  Everyone's favorite tow truck takes over the world. Lead character voiced by Vincent Price.
Panes, Trains, & Automobiles: Trains and cars crash through plate-glass windows

Battlesip: Pilot stops to drinks tea during an aerial dogfight

Edited August 4, 2016 by TrainEngie
Hem! - Story of a young girl working in a Chinese sweatshop making pants.

Mr.Bea. Random guy get into a sheep and can say only BEA!

30 - Only thirty Spartans are available to fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.

Star Wars: The Rouge On. The movie about turning the Rouge switch on in a space war.

Edited August 7, 2016 by TopHeavy11

Initial D: Third Stag - Deer rampages are eminent all over Akina's touges.

Oldeneye: James Bond battles a time traveling wizard with laser eyes
Star Wars: Revenge of the Sit: Palpatine gets frustrated having to sit in his floaty Senate chair for hours, and massacres everyone there with his Dark Side powers.
